title: IStructureSystemSplitMember.GetSplitReferences
description: Gets the entities used to split this structure system split member.
returns: Array of one or more references, e.g.: IFace2 IRefPlane IFeature (i.e., another structure system member)
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IStructureSystemSplitMember::MemberType
is set to
swStructureSplitMemberType_e
.swStructureSplitMember_Reference.
